description: This file defines a React component for the reviews page of a frontend application. The component fetches review data, displays it, and provides UI elements for filtering, replying, and suggesting responses. It includes state management, data fetching via react-query, and integrates with other components like SentimentBadge and AISuggestionPanel.

methods.name: ReviewsPage
methods.description: React functional component that renders the reviews page with filters, review list, and AI suggestions panel.
